name: Les femmes du 6ème étage
storyline: Sixties, Paris, Jean-Louis Joubert and his wife ask for a new spanish nurse. In the same time, the couple is broken, so Jean-Louis goes to sleep at 6th floor with all nurses. He saw their condition and help all of them to get a better life. A day, he found love with one of them, Maria. But she must goes to Spain. He goes to Spain to find her.
